contents.text:
I believe he would like to hear more about her.
The least we can do is visit him and offer him
some closure.

Although Ganon is gone for now, there is still
so much more for us to do.
And so many painful memories that we must bear.
I believe in my heart, that if all of us work together...
we can restore Hyrule to its former glory.
But it all must start with us.
I can no longer hear the voice inside the sword.

I suppose it would make sense if my power had
dwindled over the past 100 years...
We'll make our way to Zora's Domain.

Divine Beast Vah Ruta...looks like it
stopped working.
